com.ssp.support

Class BaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssp.support.BaseTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackToDataCaptureNewQuote, BackToDataCaptureOverwriteQuote, CreateDeclinedQuoteNewBusiness, CreateNewBusinessQuote, CreateReferredQuoteNewBusiness, Log, PerformCancellation, PerformMTADeclinedQuote, PerformMTAQuote, PerformMTAReferredQuote, PerformRenewal, PerformRPMTAQuote, PerformZeroMTAQuote, RaiseCollection, RaiseInsurerPayment, SearchTransactions

    public class BaseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    BaseTest contains methods that will run BeforeSuite, BeforeMethod, AfterMethod and AfterSuite. It also has the method defined to load the properties file and read the login credentials and URL. It also has the intiliasation of the variables, method to add test info in all test cases. BaseTest is being inherited by all the test cases.
    Author:
    Shweta.Saigal
